Unnamed: 1: Waste and tailings storage facility management
Unnamed: 8: COMMENTS

West Moreton consists of the Jeebropilly, Chuwar, and New Oakleigh Mines. Chuwar was fully rehabilitated and relinquished in FY22. New Oakleigh was undergoing rehabilitation since FY13 and was sold in FY23. Jeebropilly has been undergoing rehabilitation since FY20.
The Burton Mine was sold during FY22.

West Moreton consists of the Jeebropilly, Chuwar, and New Oakleigh Mines. Chuwar was fully rehabilitated and relinquished in FY22. New Oakleigh was undergoing rehabilitation since FY13 and was sold in FY23. Jeebropilly has been undergoing rehabilitation since FY20.
The Burton Mine was sold during FY22.
